title: Sankore Madrasa Timbuktu image circa 1300 Q2

content.prompt: The founding of the institution shown in the image is best understood in the context of which of the following?

choices.label: The fragmentation of the Abbasid Caliphate
The migration of Arabic-speaking peoples to the Swahili coast
The diffusion of Islamic practices across the Indian Ocean trade networks
The spread of Islam from northern Africa

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
